name: Hermit (kylep)
description:
You wake up on a strange island with unknown flora all around you. Cultivate, harvest and discover new species in a lush procedurally generated world. Your objective is filling the top bar with all different types of fruit, but there is no reward, it's only a challenge.  🙂

This game is just a passion project to make me forget about winter.

Features include:

  • Vines, trees and curly plants  🌿
  • Fruit to harvest  🍎
  • Special abilities   🔥
  • Trading with birds  🦜
  • One cute dog  🐕

Controls:
a+d keys to move and click and drag with your mouse to interact.

Drag fruit to the ground to grow a new plant of the same type.

Drag fruit to your player to eat, and status effects may apply depending on the type of fruit eaten. If you don't eat, your will become weak and won't be able to do much until you eat again.
